title.rendered: Career Counselling session by M&G team for youth trainees

content.rendered: Employees from M&G Global Services held a productive career counselling session for the youth enrolled in Smile Foundation’s STeP programme in Mumbai. Their interactive sessions, filled with fun activities and insightful discussions on career opportunities in various rapidly growing sectors, were truly beneficial. The STeP initiative, a national livelihood programme, equips urban underprivileged youth with job skills relevant to the market, enabling them to secure employment across diverse industries in India.
